Name: Don Daisy
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Delicately laced with light rum, it's zesty, silky smooth and easy.
History: Created in 2008 by James Tait, UK.
Nutrition: One serving of Don Daisy contains 184 calories
